item.description:
I figured we will be spending money for dinner lets go some where we don't have to spend more for a cover. Shea's has a nice venue and it not far from South Windsor.

No Big Deal is a versatile pop/dance/rock cover band from Danbury, CT. From rock clubs to private dance parties, No Big Deal entertains with their diverse repertoire of music. Five music students from Western Connecticut State University formed No Big Deal in 2006 with the goal of providing top-notch musical entertainment to clubs and bars as well private clients. The band's strong musical background allows them to please a wide range of audiences.

http://www.myspace.co...

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Change to NO BIG DEAL at Shea's No Cover after Bellini's
